item-description: This robocar was designed especially for line following competitions. The kit teaches how to program robot, explains PID algorithm, I<sup>2</sup>C interface and analog signals.
"BeetleBot" kit explains basic electronic mechanisms and components. Come alive your robobeetle. Even if you are 6 y.o!
"Watering" kit helps with learning Javascript for microcontrollers in real case: automatic watering plants. Very popular in Summer.

"Malina" (Raspberry) is an educational platform for Python programming. How to control GPIO, set up your own media server or develop a web site using Raspberry Pi computer. Colorful book and funny projects in a single box.
The kit includes Arduino boards, sensors, motors, and an educational book to study electronics and programming.
Educational kit based on ESP8266. Made in 2 variants: for Arduino and for Espruino (Javascript).
Monitoring contunious development. Javascript code runs on STM32 and requests JSON from Travis CI via HTTPS.
First Russian industrial delta-robot by BitRobotics. My task was to develop object recognition with openCV
I designed mechanical components for the conveyor. It sets up the fish-sign on the bottles.
goals: 3D models for milling and lathe machining was designed with GD&T

item-description: Electronic bracelet collects data from sensors and sends to python server. Machine learning algorithms define cats behavior.
The electronic device tells stories to kids. It is controlled via an application for Android or iOS.
3D printed Minion takes selfie photos and uploads to Instagram. It is controlled via TCP over Wi-Fi.
goals: C++ for robot and control panel

item-description: 3D printed arm with 2 microservos and 1 unipolar stepper motor. OpenCV recognizes smartphone screen and controls motor drivers.
goals: C++ OpenCV sowtware for object recognition

item-description: The clock consists of Photon chip and WS2812 led strip. Time is set up from mobile application
80 kilos of stainless steel, 55 speakers, 240 Wh batteries and sound electronics. It records and plays voices.
I set up movable lasers and mirrors on a wall. Moving by pattern, they organized geometric figures. Special adjustment mechanism was developed.
A regular spray was remade for digital. I set up an IR-led and batteries. Kinect is responsible for mapping on the banner.
Each bicycle represents musical instrument. The loudness of each depends on speed. Funny installation for the Day of Moscow.
Simple mechanics, but emotional effect. Close electric circuit to verify your feelings.
Education PCB based on STM32. One MC is for students to teach them programming. Another MC is for the teacher to activate modules and to monitor signals. EPS82 enables remote operations.
My first robot for Eurobot competition. Not too smart, but very funny. Excellent PID-regulator.
Motivator for SMM-managers. Particle Photon + Facebook Rest API.
We've won Google hackathon and the Bauman University hackathon. Frontend + Android + Backend + Hardware.
